description: React component for Jira panel handling authentication and displaying project data, utilizing contexts and custom components.

methods.name: JiraPanel
methods.description: Main React functional component managing Jira integration, authentication, and project display.

methods.name: handleAuthSuccess
methods.description: Handles successful authentication, triggers loading of Jira projects.

methods.name: handleAuthError
methods.description: Handles authentication errors by logging and notifying users.

methods.name: handleDisconnect
methods.description: Logs out from Jira and resets Jira-related data in the app.
